Secret Handshake

Secret Handshake is a monthly gathering of creative people. Join us for new friendships and good conversation.

Testimonials

"I've formed many relationships through Secret Handshake in which I've undertaken freelance projects through SH contacts. Sometimes it takes a couple of years for it to happen, but the networking is invaluable and has created 10s of thousands of dollars of work for me over the years."

Organizers

Ben Rogers

Questions, comments, or looking for introductions?
Say hello@secrethandshake.ca or hit up one of our organizers.
